short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension searches for products with coupons and the best low prices on AliExpress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps search for products with coupons and discount codes.

- Search for products with coupons and the best prices on AliExpress.
- Look for hot deals.
- Automatically apply coupons at the checkout page.
- Search similar products help you find very similar products. This is useful when you want to find similar product, but slightly different.

-----------------------------------------

We understand that finding coupons can be difficult, and most other extensions don't work properly. That's why we continuously search for products with coupons instead of searching for coupons and applying them to a single product (usually the found coupons are invalid). This extension also automatically applies the most suitable coupons and discount codes at the checkout page.

Additionally, we search for hot deals to help you find the best products at the most reasonable prices.

Apart from AliExpress, we are also adding products from other platforms such as Temu, Shein, Amazon, Alibaba, etc. The best products are waiting for you.

We are developing more features for the future. Feel free to comment and request additional features via email at lanpmediagroup@gmail.com.
